content.detailedDescription: I saw a craft with 3 bright lights and a flashing red light in the woodlands, tx.  flying very slow (much slower than the regular air crafts that pass by in this area).  the event occurred at around 7:45pm.
content.summary: I believe in ufo.  vote #1.

content.detailedDescription:
I am sorry i am not certain of the exact date, however therewere several others who worked for the same company, in different locations, who also saw the lights.
one night last spring, at exactly (i looked at my watch) 10:20pm, i was driving south on u.S. 287 just south of alvord, texas when out of the corner of my left eye i saw a flash due east and assumed it was lightning. after radioing the dispatch and being told that there were no storms on radar in that area, i figured it was a small thunderhead and continued to drive. the flashes continued, but became even brighter, too bright for lightning, and after the second flash, another driver closer to the area also radioed that he had also been seeing the lights for some time, but there were no clouds in the area and he didnt want to say anything about the lights. he then  became very shaken as he described the lights as being multi-colored and couldnt even describe the shades of the colors. he also said he thought it was a ufo, though he (nor any of us) actually saw any type of craft, structure or anything else other than the flashes.
the flashes continued as i was now driving east on highway 380 from decatur toward denton, and i could now see that the lights were actually coming from the ground, so i now assumed it might be an oilfield crew's lights flickering, or someone welding. but they were so very bright now and seemed to be moving northwest. while the other drivers in different areas all had different views and we all disagreed even on the exact location of the lights. the flashes would last in sporatic sessions from between 45 seconds to over a minute, and then at times for only 3-6 seconds at a time, with unusual and irregular pauses in between. it really did resemble an arc welder's flash. these lights continued to move northwest until disappearing into a real thunderhead over oklahoma due north of the forestburg texas area.
now, the only reason i am reporting this now is because one witness to the stephenville sighting had described the lights as resembling 'welder's torch' and i remembered stating how they looked like an arc welder reflecting light in the air, but maybe 100 times brighter. i only saw the lights as a light blue tint, though, but the other drivers seemed to see different colors. we all agreed to watch the news and see if there was some simple explanation the next day, but there was never any mention. this continued until around 2:45am.
i also saw them again in the same area the following night, but only for a period of about 90 minutes that time.
i wanted to report this as it might be helpful information in the ongoing stephenville sighting, and thank you for your work also.
content.summary: Very bright light flashes, moving northwest

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the bedroom window the blinking lights caught my eye. i thought it was funny a airplane flying that low. the lights were going around like in a circle. it looked like two cylinders with red lights in the middle. it was moving very slow. i did not get exited til i looked at the picture. it disapeared over the mountain. it was traveling se to sw.
content.summary: Moving from th se to the sw slow.

content.detailedDescription: I have been reluctant to tell anyone of this event, as it and i were met with less than a positive reactions when mentioned it at the time. but it has bothered me a great deal ever since. i am a retired chef, at the time of this incident i was driving a cab do to medical problems that would not allow me to continue in my field. i received a call to go to the butte, a small subsection of palmer alaska, to pick up a regular customer. i won't reveal her name as i haven't spoken to her in years and i'm not sure if she would approve. both of us were in our fifty's so we were not young impressionable kids nor were we drinking. { as a cab driver drinking and driving is considered bad form, not to mention against the law.} i was to take my passenger from the butte to a friends home in wassilla, they play cards twice a week, and i chose to go by way of the palmer/wassilla hy. it is the shortest route. the entire trip should take no longer than twenty mins. it's only about 16 miles. i am sorry about the time and date as its been a while, how ever it was winter and it was just shortly after the a-wac's plane crashed on take off from fort rich. a bit of research should narrow down the time frame. we were enjoying a mild " warm spell " [ in alaska thats relative.} the sky's were clear except for some high thin clouds scudding along at a good clip, the moon i believe had set. i was cruising along at about 45 mph and chatting, i knew my passenger well as palmer is a small town and we swapped news of friends and local politics. we had just passed the seward meridian rd. when i saw a very large triangle hanging in the air just off the palmer wassilla hwy. a spot where the terrain slops down into a valley. { to the left, we were going west/north west.} it { the object} was lower than the mountains to the right of us and absolutely motionless. it made no sound what ever and i rolled down the window just to see if i could hear it. i slowed the cab down to about 25 mph and bent over the wheel to get a better look at it with out wrecking the cab. i called my passengers attention to it. hey, ------, do you see that? oh my god! she replied, aliens are beaming up the palmer dump. she said. i chuckled.  but, then it got a bit stranger, i had a 4 million candle power spot on the front seat and was going to stop and shine it up at the thing, partly to see if it would reflect the light and partly hoping it would get a response. i don't know how to explain this. i kept thinking, i'll pull over here and get out, but my mind kept saying, nooo, thats really not a good idea doc. the slower i drove the cab the more insistent the feeling that it wouldn't be " a good  idea " became. my passenger was also experiencing the same type of feelings. the feelings were so strong that i never did come to a complete stop, but pulled  over to the shoulder and kept moving at about 5 mph. the object it's self, besides being very big, was triangular in shape but with volume, [ it was not razor thin. ] the tips at the three axis points glowed brightly, one white one green and one red. [since it was not moving it could not be determined which end/tip was the leading edge.] the reason i mention the lights is that each tip glowed it's own color in a perfect triangle of it's own, there were no discernible rivets,welds or seams, it was as if the material the thing was made of just glowed from within. the rest of the "ship" was a silvery metal like substance, not polished brightly but clearly metallic. the overall impression was of great subtle beauty, the lines flowed with a grace that was very pleasing to the eye, simple but eloquent in it's design. a true work of art. it also was not very reflective, you could see the lights of some of the homes and street lamps reflected in the surface but they were not like in a mirror. we could judge the size pretty well as the hwy. we were on runs along on the top of a moraine and the next hwy. over is clearly visible from there and only 4 miles away and it was not at a very high altitude. [ as mentioned earlier, the mountains to the north are only about 8 miles away and are under 3,000 ft.] the object was at a lower altitude than the mts. it, was large enough to put the wassilla hi school foot ball field and it's parking lot on top of and have enough room left over for a mini market, this thing was big. i have seen a few other pictures of triangle shaped objects but most show a large circular lighted area on the bottom center, this one did not have that feature, the bottom was not lighted just the tips. we could even see a bit of the top where it curved up from the sides so it had to be fairly low. we had it in view for about 15-20 mins. first out of the windshield then out the left side windows before the " assault " on our minds became to much for my passenger and i reluctantly drove off to take her to her card party.I have to admit that i broke the law by going over the speed limit by a good bit, [about 65 mph] to get her there and a bit faster going back to see if it was still visible. but it was gone by the time i got back to where i could see past the intervening terrain and trees. i called it in to dispatch, boy was that a mistake, i got the old, "uh huh" are you sure your ok to drive bit. i am 62 years old now and the shear size and simple beauty of the thing still haunts me. we have nothing of that size that can, fly, much less hover motionless and silent then disappear with out a trace, [ no fading lites in the sky.] in less than the twelve mins. it took me to get back. and the mind thing, it was as if someone was in my head whispering, no that wouldn't be a good idea, no you really don't want to do that do you? very gentle but effective. [ i didn't stop all the way after all, nor shine my spot light on it.] i am not prone to telling tall tales, [unless i tell you first it's a tall tale.] i am not interested in public attention, on the contrary, i am, like most alaskans a very private person and shun any such thing. but, i would like to know if anyone else has seen  a thing like this and if they too were affected in a similar manner. it is also hoped that telling some body of this experience will put it to rest for me. thank you for listening.      doc smith
content.summary: A large triangeler object w/the tips lighted. [white,green and red}

content.detailedDescription:
Watched while these two florecence tubes seemed to be comunicating with each other.  the lights were flashing on and off.  they hovered off the ground maybe a foot high.  one was behind my house and the other behind my neighbors.  the one behind my neighbor went around their house and dissappeared.  the one behind mine went the opposite way up past the trees and away into the sky.  i called joe ? @ city desk of newspaper (probably detroit news) at 222-6400, but he was very dissinterested.  he told me to take a movie.  next day i borrowed my sons camera and set it up but whatever i saw did not come back.  i am writing this to you because i will be 84 years old this coming may and wanted to tell someone before i leave this world.  i did make calls to tv stations when there was a program on ufo's but could never get through.  i have never heard of anyone seeing what i saw and would like to know if anyone else has ever reported something similiar??????????????????????????  the next day wheni went out on my back porch there was a peculiar print which looked like it was made with freash white paint.  it was like a huge foot print shaped like a v with a line in the middle of the v.  i did take a picture of that and have it somewhere in my collection but i cannot believe it would be connected even though i don't know how that got there.  i did have 2 other weird experiences.  one was about 45 years ago.  i lived in detroit michigan at that time.  it was summer and our windows were open .  i woke up at approximately l:00 am to a frequency of noise i had never heard before, nor since!!!!!  i looked out the window to see where the noise was coming from and i saw a lot of green florecence lights climing up my bushes.  as i was watching, a police car drove by and all the lights turned off at once as if someone had turned the switch off.  the 
third time i just spotted something that looked like a flying saucer.  i was in florida and the next day the newspaper reported that they got numerous calls from people who thought they saw a flying saucer.  i was not one of the callers.  in as much as nobody has ever bothered to acknowledge and of the few communications i have made on the internet i would be pleased to know if anyone reads this.  all you have to write is yes or no.  thank you  ps: i just noticed your questions.  i went to get a drink of water from my kitchen and passed the window wall that looked over the back of my house which sat on a swamppy bit of water and as i passed i noticed some flashes of light and went to see what they were.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked out back window saw 2 objects shaped like long floresence tubes  flashing lights to each other like sos

content.detailedDescription: We watched this on channel 3 news january 11th 2008 .If you go to channel 3 corpus christi texas news website and put in (was it a bird or plane)in search   they have a great video of what was seen in corpus christi texas sounds like the same object that was seen in northern texas a few days before.Every one in corpus chriti has been talking about it.
content.summary: Fast moving fireball object captured by the news station

content.detailedDescription:
I went in to make coffee and noticed what i thought was a police helicopter spotlight, stationary. let my dog out, made coffee and woke up enough to realize something wasn't right. kept glancing at the light which had not moved. let my dog in and walked to the edge of the patio to see the light. it blinked off and right back on one time. there was no sound. as i stood and watched it i wondered how a light so strong and bright wasn't lighting up the whole neighborhood. went inside, got my coat and camera and took several pictures, (which was useless because they looked like a distant street light, as was described by the truck driver that also took pictures). went back inside, got my coffee and sat down to transfer them to my computer. i estimate it was there between 30 and 45 mins from the time i first saw it. last time i looked, it was gone... i did not get upset because i have seen ufo's since childhood (although i didn't know what they were at the time). i am 72 yrs of age.

i hesitate to tell you this because it is so unbelievible: i (and neighbors)watched a total of 6 ufo not more than a 10th of a mile away and 2-300ft above the ground in lancaster, tx during the summer of '61 or '62. i believe there was something in the paper or on the news at the time about jets going up to look for them. shortly after the az. 'flap' i (and other hwy traffic)saw a ufo lift off a bluff which i had just passed by, west of needles ca. my husband and i are retired truck drivers and the thing that amazed me the most was that not a single driver or 4 wheeler said a word on the cb radio. it was as though the radio had went dead. by the way, underneath it, there were 6 bright white lights as it lifted off. i believe it lifted off because a trucker had just parked beneath it on the hwy sholder.
so ok, call me a kook... i've seen what i have seen and more!
content.summary: Extremely bright light that blinked off and back on instantly, only once.

content.detailedDescription:
The only reason i am concerned about this experience is the fact that it happened in close proximity (in distance and time) to the stephenville, texas, sightings.

i was driving east on the main street in breckenridge with a clear view to the eastern sky.  i noticed a 'reddish star' that was much brighter than the others nearby--i first thought to myself, "wow! mars is bright tonight!"  as i was looking at the light, it intensified to become even brighter.  i then thought that i was looking at the landing lights of an airplane that had turned towards me, thus causing the intensification.  however, there were no other signal lights which would have been easily visible from an airplane.  also, there was no motion to the light over time that i was observing it; it was stationary in the sky, even as i moved east.  after a short time, the light returned to the previous intensity---still standing out among the stars.

as i continued home, i turned on a residential street to the south.  when i went through the next three intersections, i used the lack of obstructions to look back east and confirm that the light was still present, bright, and motionless.  i turned again to the east, then back to the south through a tree-filled residential neighborhood before turning back east on my street where i would again have a view after about a minute without being able to see the light.  it was then that i noticed that the light was either gone or the light had diminished to a point where it no longer stood out in the sky.

i stood outside for a few minutes, trying to understand what i had seen.  i am a stargazer; i took astronomy classes in college and have always had an affinity for the sky.  i am also trained as a meteorologist and have studied aviation.  i scanned my brain to find some atmospheric or astronomic explanation to no avail.  i am also a skeptic about ufos.  i do believe that other civilizations exist in the universe, but i doubt they are visiting us.  so i remained dumbfounded.  i came inside and promptly described the event to my wife.  i was confused and wanted to let her know what happened "just in case something like a supernova made it on the news" and she would know that i saw it, too.

while i never saw any news of strange astronomical phenomena, soon afterwards the news was filled with stephenville residents' sightings of ufos.  stephenville is located about 65 miles southeast of breckenridge, so hearing of the sightings there excited my curiosity.  and, thus i found my way to mufon to make a report.
content.summary: Bright light of changing intensity in distant sky

content.detailedDescription:
While deer hunting at my camp in mason county texas, we had just stepped out on the porch for a smoke after dinner when we noticed an extremely bright object just above the tree line to the north east of the camp house. thinking it was mars as it had a definate reddish tinge we soon realized it was in the wrong position to be mars or some other star.
the time was approximately 9:30pm . being familiar with the night sky in this area, it was easy to rule out any form of aircraft as it is normal to see commercial jet traffic at high altitudes traversing from east to west or vise versa.  i went inside and got a pair of nikon 10x30 binoculars which we used to observe the object. the object/objects has no disernable movement so i thought they might be a heliocopter, but i did not see any nav lights . i also noticed one dimmer light directly obove the light and 4 more strung out horizontally to the left of the bright light. the lights were equidistant apart, a very strange configuration for possible stars i thought.  again this object was very low to the horizon and in an area where no starts or such are normally observed and was the britest visable object in the sky. after five minutes or so the lights dimmed to the point that they were not visible. they then came back on. this occured several times over the next 20 minutes until the light abruptly shut of not to be seen again. ther was no disernable movement of the lights. the night sky was partly cloudy with stars  and commercial jet traffic visable but ther were no clouds to the north that could account for the dimming and blocking  the lights. i do not know what it was but this event occured the saturday night before and to the southwest of the stephensville event. this more tha anything convinced me to  report this. i have never seen anything quite like this.
content.summary: Observe d bright light in sky that was not aircraft or any known star

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving towards my house, after christmas shopping, on paterson plank road in secaucus. we look over to our left, and both of us,at the same time, were in utter amazement at what we saw. it was a huge ufo...The same size as the ranch style home it hovered over. it was stainless steel in color, oval shaped, and there was a large white light..Like a search light looking for something, going over the entire roof. there were a couple of colored lights on the back end of the craft... that were part of the craft...I remember green ones. we pulled over, we were right across the street from it. i was driving, so i got out and my friend came to my side of the car. i know it sounds weird but i wanted to get closer. it made no sound at all. paterson plank road is a main road and, yet, no one was around. as we started to move across. we got to the double yellow lines and it was gone in a flash. of course we stood and stared at each other like "what the heck?" thank god we were both there, otherwise we might have thought we were nuts!! there was no doubt what it was...We were way too close to second quess it. i wish there were cell cameras around then. i always wondered about the people who lived in that house and if they were ever abducted. we never reported it but talk about every time we see each other.
content.summary: The ufo was hovering over a home..20ft away from us

content.detailedDescription: I woke up early in the morning and i was going to get a cup of coffee from allsups when i saw a bright egg shaped object in the sky. my first reaction was "oh my god". i knew that i had to report it so i decided to come here to report it. iam still shookin up from what i saw.
content.summary: It flew by allsup's

content.detailedDescription: While driving to work this morning, i noticed a very bright object in the ese sky, just left of scorpio. it was so bright that it appeared close. i figured that i may overtake it before i had driven 30 miles. this never happened. so my next thought was that it was venus. upon arriving at my destination, i pulled up the sky and telescope website and the interactive sky chart. i plugged in the time of sighting and rotated to the location. sure enough it was venus. the relationship of the sun, venus and the earth made for a beautiful observation. in fact you could still see it after the sun rose. i was disappointed that it wasnt an ufo, i sighted one in 1989, but thrilled at the picturesque scene our solar system has to offer.
content.summary: Venus bright in the southeast sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on us 277 through haskell, tx at about 5:45 p.M. on 1/17/08.  an oncoming, southbound haskell p.D. cruiser pulled over and stopped, causing me to look westward at him, and i then saw the object in the western sky.  i believe the haskell pd officer had pulled over in order to observe this.  i continued driving north and had to alternate my focus on the road to the north, but i mostly continued monitoring the object off to the west.  i briefly took my eyes off it about 5 times to check the road north of me, but the object was continually there in about the same position in the sky each time i resumed monitoring it.   the final time i took my eyes off it to check the road, it had completely vanished when i looked back at it.   the event totaled about 20 seconds.   the sky was mostly clear, and the object was very metallic and bright, apparently from the setting sun shining off it.   it may have been moving the whole time but seemeed stationary until suddenly vanishing.  it could not possibly have been an airliner, a weather balloon, etc. i'm very skeptical of ufo sightings, so my very first thought was that even though it certainly seemed like a "flying saucer," it surely must be something else, like a weather balloon.   i literally was trying to identify it as something else the whole time, but this was not possible.   it wasn't scary ... just awesome and very curious.  i hope to hear a reasonable explanantion but simply can't imagine what that may be.  very interested to know if the haskell pd officer saw it too.
content.summary: Hovering/stationary, 5000 ft?   off to west;  suddenly vanished; witnessed by pd?

content.detailedDescription:
I was working at a summer camp on green lake when other staff members and myself we sitting at the waterfront talking. we normally see strange things that occur late at night and at the time were going to the if there were any northern lights that appeared like it did the other nights. there were abotu 10 other staff members total.
what we saw and though at first were 3 lights moving across the sky in the shape of a triangle and thought they were satellites. but, the lights were going very quickly and then stopped. the triangle got bigger (the lights spreading out) and so it was a much larger triangle. then the triangle moved across teh sky again and dissapeared. about 5 seconds passed and the lights appeared into their original shape  and size om a different part of teh sky. the lights then completely split and went into different directions in the sky, stopped then all at one moved from the left part of the sky to the right.  they disappeared and reappeared in the triangle and the shot off extremely fast.
not but 1 minute later we saw planes coming in from the going to the rights and making passes where the lights were originally. they kept going back and forth search the sky. we assumed that they were military planes and were searching for these lights and were goign very fast. but, not nearly as fast as these lights were going.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Three lights in the shape of a triangle move across sky and then split rapidly to different directions, dissapear and reapear in diffirent areas

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i went camping and motorcycle riding in an area north of reno called the "moon rocks" when in the middle of the night we noticed a large teardrop shaped object with a couple lights hovering silently above the mountain.  my friend and his wife noticed it first and said "do you think we should wake chris and show him."  i told them that i was awake and looked out the window of the trailer.  as soon as i looked out i immediately jumped up, grabbed my digital camera, and ran outside.  i knew that what ever it was, it wasnt something usual and the first thing that impressed me was how large it was, then i thought how still it was hovering over the mountain.  i remember it was dark out and the ufo was dark but there were a couple lights and after about 30 seconds it started to move.  it came towards us to the right and started to climb in altitude,  moved very quickly and made no sounds.  as it started to move i tried to take a picture but out of excitement, instead of pressing the button to take a picture i kept turning the camera off, then back on, then off again.  by that time the ufo was to far away.  i believe that alien life must exist but i dont know if i believe that we have ever been visited by aliens.  i can understand it if they might be reluctant to show themselves just yet because of the impact it might have on our culture, religion, etc but i dont think they would appear in sighting and taunt us.  i also assumed that if they had this kind of technology why would they have lights?  i assume that it must have been something the military has been testing seeing how i had heard that area 51 testing moved from south nevada to north nevada at the falien airforce base, about 45 minutes from the 'moon rocks' where we were camping.  that being said, extraterrestrial or not, what i am certain of is that three adults witnessed something so amazing that it caused us to run out of a warm trailer into the freezing night and stand there shaking while admiring a piece of technology so advanced that it left us in awe.  as i said, it was a very large, as wide as a jumbo jet from wing to wing, smooth, dark, had the ability to hover and fly silently and accelerate at high speeds.  without a doubt in my mind i know that what we saw was real and not any kind of optical illusion or anything of that sort.  either it was extraterrestrial or the us military has technology more advanced then we could ever imagine.  i speculate its the later.  its not much of a story and i have never written about it until now, four years later, but i am clear on what i saw even though sometimes i think it was to unbelievable myself.  for people who are pessimistic, ufos exists from one origin or another and i would be happy to clearly and as detailed as i can explain my store even under the scrutiny of a lie detector or anything else.  i wish i had more to tell but it was as simple as this and although the three of us know we just witnesses something incredible, later we just went back into the trailer, laughed at what we saw, and went to sleep knowing that we will probably never see anything like it again and that no one would believe our store.
content.summary: Large, dark, some lights

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, daughter and i were
> driving home from dinner, and i had already seen what looked like a plane
> outside my window. we are in the iah far nw corridor.  my husband
> slowed down and said do y'all see that? what is that? it's not moving. i
> thought he was kidding, and waited for him to start laughing,and tell me he was kidding.  needless to say, we all started to look at it and we slowed down
> and the object was not moving. we were just frozen! it was just hovering over a neighborhood,
> kinda high, but close enough to somewhat tell what it was. it had 3 white
> lights,in the shape of triangle- 2 red lights, one would blink constantly and the other one would blink every now and then. so we kept going and stopped at the stop sign to
> make sure it wasn't moving, so i rolled down my window to listen for
> plane or helicopter sounds. (i've been a reporter and have been in many helicopters before) but it was quiet and just there hovering.. so we kept going and i made
> my husband turn around, but as i turned around in my seat i saw it dart- to the left then up a bit took off -and it was gone! when we turned back round and it wasn't there anymore. as we drove closer to the area, we saw what looked
to be another one. the second one was higher up, had a light that looked like a flashlight and grew brighter and brighter as it was going up and down and the light went straight up into the clouds and reached what seemed like miles. the sky was bright due to the moon and we could see the clouds very well. as if it was looking for something. then all of a sudden it started to move slowly horizontally. 
 then husband wouldn't follow it anymore,(think he was spooked) so we came
home.  a bit later we heard several helicopters in the area.

i reported this sighting to another website and found out another one had been sighted in houston two days prior. you can find these reports at 
hbcc ufo research. i saw the larry king show and thought you might be interested in this as well. although my report and the other one are no where near as amazing as those in stephenville, but all are in texas and close in date.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We saw an object hovering over a neighborhood adjacent to ours, with three lights and another one as the other disapperarr

content.detailedDescription:
As i was standing on my patio smoking a cigarette, as i do every evening. i was looking into the night sky as usual and enjoying the serenity of the night. i saw an object suddenly appear. it was like an elongated egg shape without a defined middle section. it was totally black in color. on top was one steady bright light. on the bottom was one light that seemed to flash every few seconds. in the center (where i would calculate the center to be) were several 2-3 lights that remained on and looked as though they may have changed colors from white, to blue to red. the object remained in one place, as in hovering. there was no sound at all, no sound of jets or engines. it just appeared without an entrance trail or other announcement and disappeared in about 1-1/2 minutes the same way. it was just visable, and then invisable in a very short time. the object was absolutely huge. many times larger than any aircraft i have seen.  i can certainly understand now how these crafts can appear and disappear without many people seeing them.  they are very quiet and unless you are looking exactly where they appear, you will definitely miss it.  there was no time for me to contact anyone to tell them to take a look at it.  it seemed that the craft came in just to view the area for a little bit.
my first thought was, "wow, that's what an ufo looks like!" i was mesmerized by it. then my thoughts went to the fact that i had not heard much about ufo's lately and with all the people who have cell phones with cameras, i wondered why more pictures weren't available. i don't have access to such a phone, but even if i did, it was too dark to take a photo that would be worth anything. so, i won't say anything to anyone about this as they may think i am crazy. but, i do know what i saw and do believe it was an ufo. i was not afraid of the ufo as much as i was about what other people will think about my having seen it.
content.summary: I looked into the sky and saw this object, absolutely quiet, no engine or jet sounds, 1 light on top and bottom and with several near center

content.detailedDescription:
I'm at work again looking up towards the sky as i typically do i see something that looked oddly shaped along that the fact it didn't move just hovered.  east of the mountains heading south or at least thats how it apeared.  but i must emphasize it never moved just hovered.  for only about 4 minutes did this thing last its would glow a great deal then appear to have disappeared then reappear strange if you ask me considering that no known object such as a jet or choper has any of these characteristics.  after awhile performing the same way as my first report stated it just then poof gone without a trace staring at the skies for a time to have never see this strange object again.  to see this happen once is one thing but to have seen it again within days apart in the same area makes me wonder what was it doing and why in the same direction.  pretty unblieveable if you ask me and sorry to say i'm the only witness and thats the way it happens i'm always alone when i discover these sorta of strange anomilies.

point #5 i make a point because this time i didn't feel excited like the first time.  as it seems this time experience was normal i had already been immune by the first appearance so this time it wasn't a big deal and i believe it knew i was watching it and it was watching me but simply did what it was what ever doing and then just left.

me personally believes the reason why it returned or assuming it never left it wanted me to see it and wanted me to tell someone about it why what is still the question who knows at this point why it did what it did there must be a reason and if infact there is one i will find it one way or another.
content.summary: Never moved, pulsating glow and faded

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work on january 2, 2008. about midday i went out on the loading dock for a short break, i noticed a bird gliding overhead and i decided to see if i could take a picture of it.
after a few days i uploaded the picture to my computer. while looking at the picture i noticed something above the bird, which i didn't notice while taking the picture. i zoomed in to get a closer look, and it appears to be a ufo.
see attached photos.
1. origianl
2. 1:1
3. cropped and zoomed
content.summary: Took a picture of a bird

content.detailedDescription: Between 6:30 a.M. & 8:30 a.M. jan.19,2008, i stepped outside onto our deck.And noticed in the southeast sky a brighter than normal star-i thought.But as i looked for other stars you know the ones that are visible at dawn.Those had faded except this very bright star-like thing. well i'm thinking the morning sun is shining on the last astronamical object in our orbit or even in space. but as the sun rose , this object stayed visible. don't forget i have a set of bi-nocs. handy! well commensence tells me this object is in our atmosphere, fixed. with the sun rising this object really started shining and through bi-noculars it appeared spherical& metallic. as time passed and the sun was getting higher and the morning haze,and some high clouds i lost sight of what i was observing. atmospheric conditions prevailed so the object could still be there!
content.summary: At sunrise looking southeast up about 30 degrees was brighter than norml star-like ,spherical through bi-noculars.

content.detailedDescription: See original submission on 12/29/07  after careful study i have changed my estimated date of even to 4/10/81.  saw disc shaped  ufo day time, sun had just set below horizon, watched it briefly high above me, perhaps 500 feet, motionless, no sound, then it flew south between new creek mountain and knobley moutain ranges very fast, i now estimate it flew 20 miled in about 10 seconds.
content.summary: Original report submitted 12/29/07, date of sighting is changed to 4/10/81 (est.)

content.detailedDescription: Me and a co-worker were delivering a new motor hame to las vegas. we stopped to coffee up at the state line truck stop just across the state line on i-44 where sw missouri meets ne oklahoma. as we walked toward the store front. we looked up to see a large, very large air craft directly over head "flying saucer" with round lights around the perimeter. we could only see part of the lights due to they were out of view as they progressed around the sides to the other side we could not see. it seemed to be gray/black in color with orange/yellow round lights all around the edge that we could see. it was huge. the largest thing in the air that i have ever seen. large as a county high school building. it covered most of the gas island parking lot for trucks and the store we were approaching. we looked around and no one seemed to care at all about it. customers at the gas island and the clerk gal inside the store said "no big deal, we see them all the time." "they are flown from the old closed us army and air force air fields in the quad state area. i had a camera but did not use it for concern of taking pics of classified air craft. we watched for about 15 to 20 min. i did not want to stop watching till it left that is if it was going to move. no sound no exhaust apparent. the craft then rose straight up for a long way, then tilted upward to my right side and flew away into the stary sky in a flash of speed like i have never seen before and disappeared into the dark night sky.  so very cool to see an entire craft instead of just lights in the sky. it was so close to the ground and to us that i could have easily hit it with a 22 rifle or air gun.  i never reported it to any authority due to my assumption that it was us classified craft. the half dozen people to whom i spoke all said that this was common place in their area and that no one ever stirs the issue.  none the less it was the largest and most awesome air craft of any type that i have ever seen. thank you for listening.
content.summary: Large disc craft directly over a state line truckstop just a couple hundred feet above our heads

content.detailedDescription: in 1986 on a beautiful clear night in june, i was traveling home after a church service. i was listening to the radio and traveling around 45 mph. as i rounded a  sharp curve, i happened to look to my left across a small river, about five hundred feet away, and above a small mountain.  there, just above the tree tops about fifty feet i saw a huge object floating along almost motionless.  i immediately stopped my vehicle in the middle of the road, turned off my radio and rolled down my window.  it was at least as large as a football field.(i was in the coal trucking business in those days and i noticed the lights first looked like marker lights on an eighteen wheeler which marked the whole outline.)  it had one flashing, rotating light on the bottom which was changing from amber to a pale white light.  i then looked above the object and there was another one about two hundred feet. the one which was closer to the ground was just slightly moving about half its size in front of the other. my first thought was, "man, what two big helicopters." all of a sudden i realized..There was no sound at all! i turned off my engine to be sure and listened and there was no sound. i even looked at the trees below the object and they were still. i suddenly thought about other traffic rounding the curve and crashing into me, so i quickly started my vehicle and drove about three hundred feet to a wide place where i could get out of way of traffic.  i again turned off my vehicle, lights and all, opened the drivers door and stepped out with one leg in the car and one on the ground. i watched the two object for about a minute as they slowly moved silently above the trees. i knew by the way they were going they would soon pass directly over a coal strip mining job in a couple of minutes.  the road went up a hill just a couple of miles down the road and i thought if i can get there, i will be a lot higher and able to see even better. i drove very fast for about three minutes and arrived at the intersection at the top of the hill. i spun around, and the objects were gone. i turned on my cb radio and listened to the night shift at the mine and they were talking about normal things. i was not scared as much as i was interested in the objects. as i laid in my bed that night i realized i had truly seen ufos. i didn't believe, but i do now.
content.summary: Two large rectangular objects outlined with multicolored lights and bigger than a football field.  there was no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription:
Not jumping on the "band-wagon", but so glad other people have seen these objects..For the last 5 yrs have witnessed some unknown lights around the wise county area...Last tues 1/7/08, at approx 0545, my husband and i were headed to work..We both noticed a very bright rusty colored "star", southeast in the sky.. something did not fit..Not like other stars we had seen, and when i got home that evening did a search to see what planents could look like that..Maybe mars?.. 
then 5yrs ago, was about a week before christmas,. headed home on highway 287 north.. ..Noticed 3 bright fluoresant type green orbs in the direction of highway 51 (which would be west of 287).These were not too high in the sky.. first thought, fireworks for the holidays, but the shape and how the orbs moved in all one unit was odd.Then it just went dark in sky and no more... always has bothered me, because wanted to know what these were... did not feel in danger, but just curious.. good luck in finding out the truth..
content.summary: Rusty colored bright glow south east sky

content.detailedDescription:
After yesterday morning "white starlike object" moving straight up and then to the east, moving far away, then closer, then disappearing i woke up at 4:50 am this morning and looked out the window to see three "pulsating red and blue" "start" hovering lower than the real stars in the dark, crystal clear sky. the real stars are mostly higher in the sky and stationary the whole time. these three "pulsating, hovering lower stars" are about parallel to each other, one to the left and one to the right (about nine feet ground distance measurement, and the third "pulsating star" is about 3/4 the distance, between the two others, closer to the one on the right. but the "center" one is larger and brighter because i believe it is actually closer to me. about 20 minutes later i look again....The larger, center "star" is gone. the two others are still in the same position, one left (south) and one right (more west). at about 5:50 am i look again, and just then i see the one on the left, above a garden center building here, start to "disappear." it happens in a second, but suddenly gets very, very tiny and "the light goes out!!" it's gone!! it either just "disappeared" or it moved swiftly in a paralell (not up or down direction...And disappeared)  all the other real stars are still very bright, same position, no cloud cover!! the "pulsating star" on the right is still about the same postion, about the same distance and size. at about 5:50 am i started watching the last "star" on the right because it was about the same spot the "star" yesterday was positioned in the sky when i saw it move straight up!" from 5:50 am until about 6:45 am i watched this one from inside and outside. it is about 9 degrees out this morning!! at about 6:00 am i noticed this one started to move "inches down first, then up, then about 6:15 am it moved parallel...But away from me toward the west. at that time an airplane moved across the sky from north going south, between my view and the object. about fifteen minutes later, the "star" moved again closer toward my direction, got larger, still moving parallel, not up or down. then it moved "inches up and down," because the view was obscured by the trees, so i had to go outside to see it was still there. then about 6:35 am it began to move westerly, and "disappeared," just as the second one to the left, over the garden center building had done. just sort of becomes quickly "like a little dot, then lights out!!" 
      from new york.....My sister called my time 6:10 pm (here time 7:10 pm to tell me she just had "another encounter" with this time a "bright white object with crystal like lights all around it, and beams of light from it" on the same road by my parent's house that we had the "close encounter" with the "spaceship with red and blue flashing lights" on july 11, 2007. she saw it over a friend's house, in the distance in the sky, about a mile up the road, and about a mile from our house. as she continued to drive she noticed "it was not over her, but was traveling parallel with her up the road."  at one point just before getting to the house, "a light, like moonlight came into her vehicle through the moonroof on her car."  at first when she called she sounded more "excited" than scared to me and i was surprized, after the terrifying experience in july. later when i spoke to her she said she felt "energized" and perhaps it was from the adrenelin from being scared. now talking about it, she was really scared again. she is moving very soon, but i don't think she is moving far enough away. honestly, with seeing these things out here also, i don't know where you can "move to!" we are hoping they are some sort of our military or government "top secret" security efforts. i wish they would tell us. this is a little scarey. now i have to keep watching!!
content.summary: Three

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on our deck and we saw a flash of orange.
i asked my husband if i was imaging it or not, he said no i can see it too
it was changing color from orange to red, then gold to a white light. it was moving around erractily. we continured to watch it for five minutes then it started to fade to a white star like shape. we live on the second floor of an apartment building. near the kennebec river. i was feeling scared because this is not the frist time i saw one. and yet fascinated, i wish it had of been closer because i dont know the definate shape. the color was what made us frist notice it and that it was moving around strangely. it stayed stationary for a little bit like 2 min. then wiggle around.... up down left to and right.. then the light was fading in and out.
content.summary: Orange blimp

content.detailedDescription: It was around 5-5:30 in the afternoon.  i was driving back from stephenville, texas in a rural area between deleon and gorman, texas and i looked toward the east field as i was headed north i came upon a bend in the road on hwy. 6.  it was a clear day and i saw a black object in the sky and it seemed like it was barly moving and i thought my eyes were playng tricks on me.  it was black in color, long and rectagular in shape and appeared to have no wings.  i slowed down and rolled down the window and the sound was extremly high idle but a smooth hum.  i thought maybe it was a blimp but the shape was wrong.  it seemed to be barly moving.  it wasn't low to the ground but not as high as an airplane would be flying.  i hurried home and told my wife and thought nothing more about it until the stephenville incident came up.  i was freaked out over the whole thing and i felt very erry.  i have never seen a weather balloon but i'm sure it wasn't a weather balloon or blimp because of the shape.  it stayed visible in my rear view mirror for the next five miles.
content.summary: Witness saw a long rectagular very black object stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have been informed by a alian group that they would like to meet the people on plantet earth.

they come in peace and are willing to inform us of any questions we have.

no guns in park....!

you must be in the park by 11:59 pm everone will have to park and walk into the park.



latitude: +36.48333 (3628'59.988"n)
longitude: -117.1 (11706'00"w)



1 from interstate 15 south , exit on nv hwy 160 west
2 drive 60 miles to pahrump, nevada. turn left on bell vista road (3 miles north of hwy 372)
3 drive 30 miles to death valley junction, california. turn right on ca hwy 127.
4 drive about 300 feet. turn left on ca hwy 190.
5 drive 30 miles to furnace creek visitor center.
content.summary: Furnace creek

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:15 p.M. in the evening on 21 december 2007,my wife and i were traveling east between jonesboro and gatesville, coryell county, texas, through sparsely settled open ranch country, on hwy 36 in our dodge ram 3500 truck to meet some friends for dinner when my wife, who was looking out the right hand window saw an extremely bright object coming from the west which she initially thought might be a falling star, as it was streaking somewhat like ones she had seen.  when she realized it was larger than any shooting star she had ever seen, getting brighter, and much lower in the sky she called out for me to slow down and take a look at this thing, which i did.  i first saw it as it passed by her passenger window on our south side and then got a good look at it through our front window.  what i saw was an extremely large, bright white lighted object streaking through the sky at a rapid rate of speed faster than any plane i have ever seen, and i fly a lot, making no sound or sonic wave. not only was it very, very bright, but it's extreme speed seemed to make light bend around it and stream from it so as to make it's actual shape hard to make out. i saw what i thought were small specks of blueish light, which were fast and blurred also embedded in and streaking along the side of this thing as it passed in front of us.  when we first saw it this object was coming across the sky at a slight angle but then it appeared to level off a bit and disappeared suddenly as it neared some hills east of gatesville, just like a shooting star does when it flares out.  when we arrived at our destination dinner party we were quite excited at what we had seen, never having seen anything like it before, and told some folks about it, none of whom appeared much interested.  about that time a couple who had arrived a couple of minutes ahead of us spoke up and said they, too, had seen this thing from another angle at the same time as they were coming into gatesville on a parallel route, hwy 84, from out towards evant, texas. again, however, no one seemed too much interested and the group moved on to dinner.  although we will probably never know exactly what we saw, we saw what we saw, it was what it was, and we enjoyed the show, however short, while it lasted.
content.summary: Very large, very fast, low flying, extremely bright glowing meteor like object descending from the west leveling off and disappearing in the east  past gatesville

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my girlfriends truck in her parents house driveway  date maybe around may 2007- it was dark so 8 or 9pm , and was looking up at the stars, when i noticed a spot with no stars, which was odd. then i realized i was looking at an object very large, and dark, very camoflauged, kinda glistened, once your eye caught it you could totally see it. it was somewhat like a triangle boomarang shape with long wings kinda of with a large head compartment. oddly it reminded me of a stingray or a dragon,i know weird. after a few minutes i paniced an begged my girlfriend to look up, and she started to freak out as well. then her boyfriend pulled up and we tried to point it out to him, but by then it was moving away very fast. it looked like nothing i have ever seen, fast, moved in any directions nothing like a plane. literally the wings did flapping motions but very graceful like a stingray in water, it was like a rolling flap motion. it was so silent, and moved so fast, then it was gone. one thing i noticed it had no bright lights, it was so cameoflauged, and silent. as soon as we started to panic and point at it, that is when it finally moved and left. it was hard to tell how high above it was, maybe 200ft-400ft or so..  far above the house, but not as high as an airplane would fly.
content.summary: Litterally like a sting ray in the sky, dark, moved silently quickly,
